mapper.select: WITH TB_MEMBER_START AS ( SELECT MIN(TEMP.HIST_STRT_DTM) AS HIST_STRT_DTM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TEMP.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND TEMP.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('101') ) , TB_MEMBER_END AS ( SELECT MAX(TEMP.HIST_STRT_DTM) AS HIST_STRT_DTM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TEMP.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND TEMP.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303', '401', '402') ) SELECT TB_1.CNTR_NO , TB_1.CNTR_SN , TB_5.RCGVP_KNM , TB_2.BASE_PD_CD , TB_6.PD_NM , TB_1.IST_DT , ( CASE WHEN TB_2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN ( SELECT TEMP.HIST_STRT_DTM FROM TB_MEMBER_START TEMP WHERE 1=1 ) ELSE '' END ) AS MEMBER_START_DT , ( CASE WHEN TB_2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN NVL(( SELECT TEMP.HIST_STRT_DTM FROM TB_MEMBER_END TEMP WHERE 1=1 ), '99991231235959') ELSE '' END ) AS MEMBER_END_DT , TB_2.SELL_TP_CD -- , TB_1.CHK_PRD_CD , '' AS CHK_PRD_CD , TB_2.PD_GD_CD , TB_3.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N , TB_1.SV_PD_CD , TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL TB_2 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_2.CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_2.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL TB_3 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_3.CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_3.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL TB_4 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_SN AND TB_4.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /* 2:배송지 3:설치지 */ ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS TB_5 ON ( TB_4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = TB_5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS TB_6 ON ( TB_2.BASE_PD_CD = TB_6.PD_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT TB_1.VST_NMN_N , TB_1.IST_NMN_N , TB_1.VST_DUEDT , TB_1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , TB_1.FILT_CHNG_LV_CD , TB_2.PD_NM , TB_1.WK_DT , TB_1.MTR_CAN_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_1.PART_PD_CD = TB_2.PD_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY TB_1.VST_NMN_N, TB_1.VST_DUEDT, TB_1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, TB_1.FILT_CHNG_LV_CD

SELECT TB_1.VST_NMN_N , TB_1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AS BFSVC_WK_DV_CD , TB_1.FILT_CHNG_LV_CD , TB_2.PD_NM , TB_1.PART_USE_QTY , TB_1.VST_DV_CD FROM TB_PDBS_RGBS_WK_BASE_DTL TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_1.PART_PD_CD = TB_2.PD_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.SV_PD_CD = #{svPdCd} AND TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD = #{pdctPdCd} ORDER BY TB_1.VST_NMN_N, TB_1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, TB_1.FILT_CHNG_LV_CD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND WK_DT IS NULL AND VST_DUEDT >= NVL(#{periodDeleteYmd}, '99991231')
